name: The missing sync layer for modern apps (Changelog News #63)
summary: ElectricSQL is a project that offers a local-first sync layer for web and mobile apps, Ned Batchelder writes about the myth of the myth of “learning styles”, Carl Johnson thinks XML is better than YAML, Berkan Sasmaz defines and describes “idempotency” &amp; HyperDX is an open source alternative Datadog or New Relic.
